name: Alone (itch) (Harksa)
description:
Synopsis :

Where am I ?

What is this place ?

Am I ... alone ?

Description :

This game was made for Ludum Dare 45 (3 LD in a row, yay !) It was a little difficult to find inspiration and motivation but I'm glad I managed to create something I think is nice. It was fun !

How to play :

Arrow or WASD to move

Space to jump
